name: The Bengal Tiger
description: Light and punchy, Novotel (Kolkata) Ritika Rai's Bengal Tiger is aptly named.
directions: In a shaker filled with ice pour the spirits, some sweet and sour mix
Pour the juices and shake the mixture.
In a tall glass filled with ice pour the drink.
Garnish with a wedge of gondoraj lemon and twist a peel of the lemon over the drink.
Rub the peel on the glass for the freshness and aroma.
